flawed_nl_solution:
Drive to work:200(0.6)=<<200*0.6=102>>102
Don't Drive to work:200-102=<<200-102=98>>98
Public Transportation:98(0.5)=49 employees
98-49=<<98-49=49>>49 employees
#### 49

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 102. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
